content: the **hearts & love granny square** is a vintage block made by joining 4 little squares together the pattern features a regular granny square a heart granny square and 2 heart in a granny squares the pdf pattern comes with written instructions and a step-by-step photo tutorial a video tutorial is available for the heart in a granny square *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 5-mm e/4 usa 9 uk hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used paintbox yarns simply aran in the following colors **a** pistachio green 224 **b** slate green 226 **c** jewel 72 **d** champagne white 202 **size** 8 20 cm **gauge** 4 rounds of a granny square in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
